complaints.summary: Home route 500s because DocumentDiscoveryModal fails to compile
complaints.details: Multiple requests to /en and / return 500 responses after the new discovery modal refactor. Next.js reports `Unexpected token `Dialog`` for src/components/global/DocumentDiscoveryModal.tsx around the Dialog wrapper, so the server cannot compile the component. See home-500-log.txt for the full stack, including repeated 500s during page load.
complaints.next_action: Restore a compiling version of DocumentDiscoveryModal (e.g., adjust the Dialog usage or roll back) so /en loads without 500 errors.

history.note: Complaint logged by Complaints pod; evidence captured at ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0002/home-500-log.txt.
Escalated to CEO from Platform-Engineering via scripts/manage-complaints.js

complaints.summary: Home page crashes because Stripe publishable key is unset
complaints.details: Loading the home route triggers PaymentModal, which throws "NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY must be set to initialize Stripe" when importing loadStripe (see PaymentModal.tsx lines 20-24). The runtime overlay blocks rendering and payments, and navigation becomes unstable while the module fails to evaluate.
complaints.next_action: Set NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY (and guard PaymentModal) so the home page and checkout render without runtime errors.

history.note: Complaint logged by Complaints pod; evidence captured at ops/artifacts/complaints-cycle-0002/stripe-publishable-key-error.txt.
Escalated to CEO from Payments-Monetization via scripts/manage-complaints.js
